name: store-api
description: Serverless inventory management platform on Cloudflare's edge

scripts.dev:api: npm run scan:modules && node scripts/generate-config.js api --dev && wrangler dev --config api/wrangler.toml --env local --persist-to .wrangler-shared
scripts.dev:api:remote: npm run scan:modules && node scripts/generate-config.js api --dev --preview && wrangler dev --config api/wrangler.toml --env preview --remote
scripts.dev:public-api: node scripts/generate-config.js public-api --dev && wrangler dev --config public-api/wrangler.toml --env local --port 8788 --persist-to .wrangler-shared
scripts.dev:public-api:remote: node scripts/generate-config.js public-api --dev --preview && wrangler dev --config public-api/wrangler.toml --env preview --remote --port 8788
scripts.db:migrate: wrangler d1 migrations apply store-database-preview --local --persist-to .wrangler-shared --config api/wrangler.toml
scripts.db:migrate:preview: wrangler d1 migrations apply store-database-preview --remote --config api/wrangler.toml --env preview
scripts.db:migrate:prod: wrangler d1 migrations apply store-database --remote --config api/wrangler.toml

author: Eri <eri@redshoes.pro>
